scripts.lint:js: eslint ./*.js addon addon-test-support app config lib server test-support tests
scripts.test: npm run-script lint && npm run-script node-test && npm run-script client-test
scripts.all-test: npm run-script node-test && npm run-script smoke-test
scripts.node-test-with-coverage: nyc --reporter lcov npm run-script node-test && node_modules/.bin/codecov
